directions: In a large soup pot or Dutch oven, combine chicken, parsnips, garlic, onions, carrots, zucchini, parsley, celery, potatoes, sweet potato, soup mix, oregano, paprika, water, wine, salt and pepper.  Cover and bring to a boil over high heat.  Boil 30 minutes, partially covered, then reduce heat to low and simmer another 90 minutes.
title: White Wine Chicken Soup
